definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs.: mng dub., perh. beat the air, or flap the wings, cf. Di De (and Wetzst in De), Bu Du (cf. Ar. maray whip, urge on a horse ?);—[[תַּמְרִָיא תִּשְׂחָק]] :[[לַסּוּם וּלְדׂבְבֽוֹ]] Job 39:18 she (the ostrich) flaps away, she laughs at the horse and his rider.
